News Flash

  1. Survey Results

    Comprehensive Plan Update Survey Results Are In! Read on...

  2. Public Board Meetings

    Board of Supervisors and Service Authority Board of Directors Meetings begin at 6:30 p.m. Read more...

  3. Household Hazardous Waste Day - June 1, 2019 - 9:00 a.m. - 2:00 p.m.

    Bring your hazardous waste items, from your household, to the Sealston Landfill Read more...

  4. King George Travel Policy Update

    Details of the County travel policy changes Read more...

  5. DRAFT - King George Economic Development Strategic Plan & Survey

    Review the DRAFT for King George County Economic Development Strategic Plan Read more...

  6. 2018-19 Budget Fee Schedules for Residential - Commercial - Planning - Zoning

    Please see the Budget Fee Schedules for the upcoming Fiscal Year 2018-19... Read more...

  7. GWRideConnect

    GWRideConnect is a free ridesharing service that assists commuters who are seeking daily transportation, such as vanpools, carpools and buses. Read more...

  8. Volunteering in Your Community

    Learn how you can volunteer in the community and help animals in need at the same time. Volunteering with King George County

  9. Employment Opportunities

    Apply for a job with King George County! Job Openings
